alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:59AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison, northern Franklin, northeastern Crawford and southeastern Washington Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Brentwood to 2 miles east of Blackburn to 2 miles southwest of Strickler. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... West Fork... Winslow... St. Paul... Cass... Saint Paul... Blackburn... Pettigrew... Brentwood... Japton... Strickler... Witter... Bidville... Woolsey... Crosses... Combs... Turners Bend... Mount Gayler... Dutton... Wyola... Sulphur City... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
